original_text: The field is the world, and the good seed stands for the people of the kingdom. The weeds are the people of the evil one,
korean_text: 밭은 세상이요 좋은 씨는 천국의 아들들이요 가라지는 악한 자의 아들들이요

sentences.original_text: and the good seed stands for the people of the kingdom
The weeds are the people of the evil one
